title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Getting a refund for a canceled or delayed flight: What to know in 2026
items.description: Though airlines might offer you a travel credit, you don't have to accept. If your flight is canceled, you are entitled to a full refund if you choose...

items.title: The best new points hotels for families to visit in 2026

items.title: 16,000 flights canceled, major airports at standstill as winter storm slams US
items.description: At airports, it's already shaping up to be the worst stretch of flight cancellations we've seen in years.

items.title: The best time to apply for these popular Capital One credit cards based on offer history
items.description: Want to know if a card's current offer is its best? We've tracked down the offer history on these popular Capital One cards so you can compare.
